epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
title: Develop Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) System
description: As a user, I want to authenticate using multiple factors, so that my sessions are secure from unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: The authentication must support OTP, biometrics, and authenticator apps. It must be compliant with PCI DSS and ISO 27001 standards.
acceptance_criteria: User can authenticate using OTP, biometrics, or authenticator apps
test_cases: Given a registered user, when they log in, then they should be prompted for multi-factor authentication.

epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
title: Implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
description: As an admin, I want to set up role-based access controls, so that users can only access functionalities appropriate to their authorization level.
attributes_and_rules: Access controls must limit functionalities based on user roles.
acceptance_criteria: Users can only access features based on their role
test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, when they log in, then they should only see the functionalities allowed by their role.

title: Develop a Responsive User Interface
description: As a user, I want the website to adapt to different devices, so that I can have a seamless experience on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
attributes_and_rules: The UI must be responsive and maintain visual consistency across devices.
acceptance_criteria: Website adapts to all screen sizes and resolutions
test_cases: Given any device, when the user accesses the portal, then the UI should adapt seamlessly to the screen size.

title: Incorporate Accessibility Best Practices
description: As an accessibility-focused developer, I want to follow WCAG 2.1 standards, so that all customers can use the portal effectively.
attributes_and_rules: The portal must follow WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards.
test_cases: Given a user with disabilities, when they navigate the portal, then they should be able to use all features without barriers.

title: Develop Dynamic Personalized Dashboards
description: As a user, I want to see a personalized dashboard, so that I can view relevant account summaries, service usage, and product offers.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard must reflect user-specific data and real-time updates.
test_cases: Given a user with an account, when they log in, then their dashboard should show account summaries, service usage, and product offers.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Implement Digital Account Opening Workflow
description: As a user, I want to digitally open new accounts, so that I can avoid visiting a branch and save time.
attributes_and_rules: Workflow must include form pre-filling, data validation, and secure transaction checks.
test_cases: Given a user starting a new account application, when they follow the workflow, then they should be able to complete the process online without errors.

epic_title: Application Drafts and Secure Document Uploads
title: Enable Application Draft Saving
description: As a user, I want to save my incomplete application, so that I can complete it later without data loss.
attributes_and_rules: Drafts must be saved securely, maintaining all data until completion.
acceptance_criteria: Users can save and resume applications
test_cases: Given an incomplete application, when the user saves a draft, then they should be able to resume and complete it later.

title: Implement Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
description: As a user, I want to track my request status in real-time, so that I know the current stage of my submission.
attributes_and_rules: Notifications must cover key milestones and support portal and email delivery.
acceptance_criteria: Users receive status updates via portal and email
test_cases: Given a submitted request, when the status changes, then the user should receive a real-time update both on the portal and via email.

title: Integrate Portal with Core Banking System
description: As a developer, I want to integrate the portal with the core banking system, so that data is consistent across modules.
attributes_and_rules: Integration should use secure APIs or middleware and ensure real-time synchronization.
acceptance_criteria: Portal data is synchronized with the core banking system
test_cases: Given a user transaction, when data is updated, then it should reflect in the core banking system in real-time.

title: Set Up Dedicated Database for Portal Performance
description: As a database administrator, I want a dedicated database for the portal, so that we can optimize performance and reliability.
attributes_and_rules: Database must support indexing, partitioning, caching, and include performance monitoring tools.
acceptance_criteria: Database supports high-speed queries and transactions
test_cases: Given portal usage scenarios, when load increases, then the database should handle the load without performance degradation.

epic_title: Comprehensive Audit Trail and Interaction History
title: Implement Secure Audit Trail
description: As an auditor, I want a full audit trail of portal activities, so that I ensure regulatory compliance.
attributes_and_rules: Audit trail must be immutable, include all interactions, and store data securely.
acceptance_criteria: All user interactions are logged securely
test_cases: Given any portal activity, when actions are taken, then an audit log should capture the interaction with all relevant metadata.
